job.title: Machine Learning / Deep Learning Engineer, Orlando, FL
job.description: lockheed martin is seeking an experienced professional in machine learningdeep learning to use deep learning techniques to detect track and discriminate different classes of objects from high resolution video the engineer will perform modeling simulation and analysis work for advanced image processing development efforts responsibilities also include the development and integration of automation data reduction and analysis tools the engineer must be able to work independently to meet expected milestones but also seek out technical guidance when appropriate or necessaryltbrgtltbrgtrelocation relocation assistance is possible for this exciting positionltbrgtltbrgtthe locale orlando is a city in the central florida area this region is a great place to live and to raise a family central florida offers lots of attractive residential housing options the greater orlando metropolitan area is the sixth largest metro area in the southeastern united statesltbrgtltbrgtthe climate here is warm and sunny all year long for the most part orlando is home to walt disney world universal studios florida and seaworld orlando is also home to the second largest university in the us the university of central florida ucf where can you get to from orlando orlando is about an hours drive from cocoa beach and the space coast to include nasa and the kennedy space centerltbrgtltbrgttampa is about hours from orlando west palm beach is about hours to the south and jacksonville is about hours to the northeast atlanta ga is hours to the northwest
